00021    // Define and initialize static variable
00022    long Diagnostic::baseInterval = 1;
00023 
00024    void Diagnostic::initStatic()
00025    {  Diagnostic::baseInterval = 1; }
00026 
00027    /* 
00028    * Default constructor.
00029    */
00030    Diagnostic::Diagnostic()
00031     : ParamComposite(),
00032       outputFileName_(),
00033       fileMasterPtr_(0),
00034       interval_(1)
00035    {}
00036    
00037    /* 
00038    * Destructor.
00039    */
00040    Diagnostic::~Diagnostic()
00041    {}
00042    
00043    /*
00044    * Read the interval from parameter file, with error checking.
00045    */
00046    void Diagnostic::readInterval(std::istream &in) 
00047    {
00048    
00049       // Check that baseInterval has a nonzero, positive value
00050       if (baseInterval == 0) {
00051          UTIL_THROW("baseInterval == 0");
00052       }
00053       if (baseInterval < 0) {
00054          UTIL_THROW("baseInterval < 0");
00055       }
00056    
00057       // Read interval value (inherited from Interval)
00058       read<long>(in, "interval", interval_);
00059    
00060       // Check that interval has a nonzero, positive value
00061       if (interval_ == 0) {
00062          UTIL_THROW("interval_ == 0");
00063       }
00064       if (interval_ < 0) {
00065          UTIL_THROW("interval_ < 0");
00066       }
00067 
00068       // Check that interval is a multiple of baseInterval
00069       if (interval_ % baseInterval != 0) {
00070          UTIL_THROW("interval is not a multiple of baseInterval");
00071       }
00072    
00073    }
00074 
00075    /*
00076    * Read output file name and open output file.
00077    */
00078    void Diagnostic::readOutputFileName(std::istream &in) 
00079    {  
00080       read<std::string>(in, "outputFileName", outputFileName_); 
00081    }
00082 
00083    /*
00084    * Set the FileMaster.
00085    */
00086    void Diagnostic::setFileMaster(FileMaster& fileMaster)
00087    { 
00088       fileMasterPtr_ = &fileMaster;
00089    }
00090 
00091    /*
00092    * Get the FileMaster by reference.
00093    */
00094    FileMaster& Diagnostic::fileMaster()
00095    {  
00096       assert(fileMasterPtr_);
00097       return (*fileMasterPtr_);
00098    }
00099 
00100    /*
00101    * Get the outputFileName string with an added suffix
00102    */
00103    std::string Diagnostic::outputFileName(const std::string& suffix) const
00104    {
00105       std::string filename = outputFileName_;
00106       filename += suffix;
00107       return filename;
00108    }
00109
